longBusinessSummary: Jindal Stainless Limited manufactures and sells stainless-steel flat products in India and internationally. The company provides ferro alloys, stainless steel slabs and blooms, hot rolled coils, plates and sheets, and cold rolled coils and sheets, as well as razor blade steel, precision strips, and long products. Its products are used in architecture, building and construction, automotive and transport, railway, consumer durable, and process industry applications. Jindal Stainless Limited was founded in 1970 and is based in New Delhi, India.
